verses.verse_html: 1But Job answered and said,

verses.text_plain: How hast thou helped him that is without power? how savest thou the arm that hath no strength?
verses.verse_html: 2How hast thou helped him that is without power? how savest thou the arm that hath no strength?

verses.text_plain: How hast thou counselled him that hath no wisdom? and how hast thou plentifully declared the thing as it is?
verses.verse_html: 3How hast thou counselled him that hath no wisdom? and how hast thou plentifully declared the thing as it is?

verses.text_plain: To whom hast thou uttered words? and whose spirit came from thee?
verses.verse_html: 4To whom hast thou uttered words? and whose spirit came from thee?

verses.text_plain: Dead things are formed from under the waters, and the inhabitants thereof.
verses.verse_html:
5Dead things are formed from under the waters, and the inhabitants thereof. ▼
▼ and the…: or, with the inhabitants

footnotes.body_text: ▼ and the…: or, with the inhabitants
footnotes.body_html: ▼ and the…: or, with the inhabitants

verses.text_plain: Hell is naked before him, and destruction hath no covering.
verses.verse_html: 6Hell is naked before him, and destruction hath no covering.

verses.text_plain: He stretcheth out the north over the empty place, and hangeth the earth upon nothing.
verses.verse_html: 7He stretcheth out the north over the empty place, and hangeth the earth upon nothing.

verses.text_plain: He bindeth up the waters in his thick clouds; and the cloud is not rent under them.
verses.verse_html: 8He bindeth up the waters in his thick clouds; and the cloud is not rent under them.

verses.text_plain: He holdeth back the face of his throne, and spreadeth his cloud upon it.
verses.verse_html: 9He holdeth back the face of his throne, and spreadeth his cloud upon it.

verses.text_plain: He hath compassed the waters with bounds, until the day and night come to an end.
verses.verse_html:
10He hath compassed the waters with bounds, until the day and night come to an end. ▼
▼ until…: Heb. until the end of light with darkness

footnotes.body_text: ▼ until…: Heb. until the end of light with darkness
footnotes.body_html: ▼ until…: Heb. until the end of light with darkness

verses.text_plain: The pillars of heaven tremble and are astonished at his reproof.
verses.verse_html: 11The pillars of heaven tremble and are astonished at his reproof.

verses.text_plain: He divideth the sea with his power, and by his understanding he smiteth through the proud.
verses.verse_html:
12He divideth the sea with his power, and by his understanding he smiteth through the proud. ▼
▼ the proud: Heb. pride

footnotes.body_html: ▼ the proud: Heb. pride

verses.text_plain: By his spirit he hath garnished the heavens; his hand hath formed the crooked serpent.
verses.verse_html: 13By his spirit he hath garnished the heavens; his hand hath formed the crooked serpent.

verses.text_plain: Lo, these are parts of his ways: but how little a portion is heard of him? but the thunder of his power who can understand?
verses.verse_html: 14Lo, these are parts of his ways: but how little a portion is heard of him? but the thunder of his power who can understand?
